attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
if 10 years of a labour government has resulted in postmen going on strike which has caused disruption and frustration to many
and if our hospitals are not fit to care for us
i think it is time for gordon brown and his cabinet to resign because their policies have failed.
another 2 years will not bear positive and peaceable fruit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
